author: Sarah Sluis
title: Feeding A DSP With Shopper Data
description:
The strategic value of commerce data continues to rise, as Infillion snaps up Catalina. Then, a court filing reveals where agencies spend clients’ money.
The post Feeding A DSP With Shopper Data appeared first on AdExchanger.
content:
Getting the rundown on the products people buy in stores has long been a valuable data business. It’s spawned companies like Catalina, IRI, Circana, NCS, SPINS and more.
And, often, the value of thi… [+1549 chars]
